title: anyone else get their settings reset to default this patch?
body: simply as the title states. werid thing is my first aram was fine but my second one it went to default. holy crap my ears hurt from that announcer voice blaring.

replies.body: Yep, something's bugging out, apologies. We're working on a fix.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=eEEr5UU8,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-12-11T19:13:11.458+0000)
>
> Yep, something's bugging out, apologies. We're working on a fix.

I had to switch from windowed back to borderless thrice now :angery:
go back and look what you did with the screen changes like when the game changed to windowed mode every game. because this is very similar might be a fix if you look at those code changes.
i see. i thought it was like the bug before where the client would only go to windowed mode and wouldnt save any other setting after game.

YES!!!
and nothing saves between games! I like quick cast on and every game I have to put them on over and over and over again...
it's so annoying
